title: IP Address RDAP Lookup
subtitle: Look up IP address allocation and registration data using RDAP through Regional Internet Registry (RIR) services. Automatically routes queries to the appropriate RIR based on IP address prefix.

googleDNS.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 8.8.8.8 (Google DNS - Public DNS service)

cloudflareDNS.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 1.1.1.1 (Cloudflare DNS - Fast public resolver)

openDNS.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 208.67.222.222 (OpenDNS - Cisco public DNS)

rfc5737.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 192.0.2.1 (RFC 5737 - Documentation IP range)

googleIPv6.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 2001:4860:4860::8888 (Google IPv6 DNS)

cloudflareIPv6.tooltip: Perform RDAP lookup for 2606:4700:4700::1111 (Cloudflare IPv6 DNS)

form.title: RDAP Lookup Configuration
form.ipTooltip: Enter an IPv4 or IPv6 address to query allocation data via RDAP
form.ipHint: Supports both IPv4 (e.g., 8.8.8.8) and IPv6 (e.g., 2001:4860:4860::8888) addresses

results.title: RDAP Data for {ip}
results.ipAddressTooltip: The IP address that was queried
results.rdapServiceTooltip: RDAP service used for the query

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Tips:
troubleshooting.validIP: Ensure the IP address is valid and properly formatted
troubleshooting.privateIP: Private IP addresses (RFC 1918) may not have RDAP data
troubleshooting.rateLimiting: Some RIRs may have rate limiting or access restrictions
troubleshooting.specialUse: Reserved or special-use addresses may not be publicly queryable
troubleshooting.tryAgain: Try again in a few moments if the service is temporarily unavailable

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.description: IP RDAP provides detailed allocation information from Regional Internet Registries (RIRs). The tool automatically routes queries to the appropriate RIR using IANA bootstrap registries.

rirs.title: Regional Internet Registries
rirs.arin: ARIN: North America, parts of Caribbean
rirs.ripe: RIPE NCC: Europe, Central Asia, Middle East
rirs.lacnic: LACNIC: Latin America, parts of Caribbean
